original_text: Your wives, children and animals can stay in this land that Moses gave to you, on the east side of the Jordan River. But your strong men must cross the river, with their weapons. They must go in front of the other Israelite tribes. You must help them 15 until the Lord gives them a place to rest, as he has already given to you. When all the other tribes are safe in the land, you may return to the land east of the Jordan. Moses gave this land to you.’
korean_text: 너희의 처자와 가축은 모세가 너희에게 준 요단 이쪽 땅에 머무르려니와 너희 모든 용사들은 무장하고 너희의 형제보다 앞서 건너가서 그들을 돕되

sentences.original_text: Your wives, children and animals can stay in this land
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 아내들, 자녀들과 가축들은 이 땅에 머물러 있을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: on the east side of the Jordan River.
But your strong men must cross the river
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신의 강한 남자들은 강을 건너야 합니다

sentences.original_text: They must go in front of the other Israelite tribes.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 이스라엘 지파들 앞에 서야 합니다

sentences.original_text: until the Lord gives them a place to rest
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그들이 쉴 곳을 주실 때까지

sentences.original_text: as he has already given to you.
When all the other tribes are safe in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 모든 지파들이 땅에서 안전할 때

sentences.original_text: you may return to the land east of the Jordan.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 요단 강 동쪽 땅으로 돌아갈 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Moses gave this land to you.'
